meanings.definition: To utter a loud cry or call.
meanings.sent1: I shout when I am excited.
meanings.sent2: Please don't shout in the library.
meanings.sent3: The parrot learned to shout 'hello' loudly.
meanings.sent4: Her colorful outfit seemed to shout happiness.
meanings.sent5: The thunderstorm made the sky shout with lightning.

meanings.sent1: His shout echoed through the mountains.
meanings.sent2: I heard a distant shout for help.
meanings.sent3: The shout of the baby woke up the entire house.
meanings.sent4: The shout of victory filled the stadium.
meanings.sent5: The shout of the coach motivated the team to win.
